price: "Bã mu cẽwa, sai dai kurum sashen abũbuwan bautawarmu ya sãme ka da cũtar hauka." Yace: "Lalle ne nĩ, inã shaida waAllah, kuma ku yi shaidar cẽwa" lalle ne nĩ mai barranta ne dagb abin da kuke yin shirki da shi."
arabic: إِن نَّقُولُ إِلَّا ٱعۡتَرَىٰكَ بَعۡضُ ءَالِهَتِنَا بِسُوٓءٖۗ قَالَ إِنِّيٓ أُشۡهِدُ ٱللَّهَ وَٱشۡهَدُوٓاْ أَنِّي بَرِيٓءٞ مِّمَّا تُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: in naqūlu illā iʿ'tarāka baʿḍu ālihatinā bisūin qāla innī ush'hidu al-laha wa-ish'hadū annī barīon mimmā tush'rikūna
